General.Name: Sintex Plastics Technology Limited
General.Description: Sintex Plastics Technology Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic products in India, the United States, and Europe. The company operates through two segments, Custom Moulding Business; and Infra, Prefab & Other Business. It offers water storage solutions; interior products, such as doors, plastic sections, and plastoboards; electrical and SMC products comprising SMC junction boxes, SMC meter boxes, SMC distribution boxes and boards, SMC distribution pillar boxes, SMC MCB distribution boxes, FRP aerial fuse boards, SMC molded service connection boards, FRP V type arms, SMC water meter boxes, FRP straight cross arms, SMC danger notice plates, starter panels, LCS, power receptacles, SMC trench covers and gratings, and SMC sheets and chequered plates; environmental and green solutions, including biogas plants, and septic tank and sub ground structures; and industrial products, such as containers, FRP underground fuel storage tanks, chemical storage tanks, pallets, and insulated grates. The company also provides automobile parts, such as trims and pillars, exterior trims, radiator grills, instrument panel, integrated design and engineering, small precision parts, under the hood and assembly parts, two-wheeler parts, and other products. The company was formerly known as NEEV Educare Limited. The company was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Kalol, India.
General.Address: In the premises of Sintex-BAPL Ltd, Kalol, India, 382721
